resources.string: Messaging needs permission to SMS, Phone and Contacts.
You can change permissions in Settings > Apps > Messaging > Permissions.
You can change permissions in Settings, Apps, Messaging, Permissions.
Choose a contact from this device
Click to open contacts list on this device
Device is low on space. Messaging will automatically delete older messages to free up space.
Messaging might not send or receive messages until more space is available on your device.
Low SMS storage. You may need to delete messages.
This one-time step will ensure Messaging will deliver your group messages properly.
Delete messages older than %s and turn on auto-delete?
Not sent. Tap to try again.
Please make a voice call to emergency services. Your text message could not be delivered at this time.
Couldn\'t send due to network problem
Couldn\'t complete database operation due to low memory
Some messages not sent in Messaging
Some messages not downloaded in Messaging
Please make a voice call to emergency services. Your text message to %1$s could not be delivered at this time.
Messaging successfully set as the default SMS app.
Switch between front and back camera
Request a delivery report for each SMS you send
Use MMS to send a single message when there are multiple recipients
Dump received SMS raw data into external storage file
Dump received MMS raw data into external storage file
Can\'t send message while loading attachments.
Network is not ready. Try again.
Switch between entering text and numbers
To send, set Messaging as the default SMS app
Set Messaging as the default SMS app
To receive messages, set Messaging as the default SMS app
No preferred SIM selected for sending SMS messages
This app isn\'t allowed by the device owner.
Too many participants in a conversation
Once you start a new conversation, youll see it listed here
Enter a contact name or phone number to start a new message
You\'ll continue to receive messages from this number but won\'t be notified anymore. This conversation will be archived.
Cellular data is turned off. Check your settings.
Can\'t send messages in Airplane mode
Cellular data is turned off. Check your settings.
Can\'t download messages in Airplane mode
Can\'t send message with unknown carrier, error %1$d
Message not sent: service not activated on network
Message not sent: invalid destination address
Could not find an appropriate application
The Name field can\'t be empty.
MNC field must be 2 or 3 digits.
Access Point Name settings are not available for this user
Send individual SMS messages to all recipients. Only you will get any replies
Send a single MMS to all recipients
Conversation deleted. Tap to show a different Messaging conversation
Storage space is low. Some data may be lost.
Please remove one or more attachments and try again.
You can try sending your message, but it might not be delivered unless you remove one or more attachments.
You can only send one video per message. Please remove additional videos and try again.
Can\'t make a voice call to emergency services here.
